feed.title: Rafael Oliveira’s Tech Blog
feed.subtitle: Insights on AWS, DevOps, and AI

entry.title: Welcome to My Tech Blog
entry.content:
Hey there! Welcome to my tech blog. I’m Rafael, a DevOps Engineer passionate about cloud architecture and automation. Here, I’ll be sharing insights about AWS, DevOps practices, and emerging technologies.

What to Expect

Expect bi-weekly posts covering:

  • Cloud Architecture & AWS
  • DevOps Best Practices
  • Infrastructure as Code
  • Kubernetes & Containerization
  • Performance Optimization
  • Security in the Cloud

Follow me on LinkedIn for more tech insights and updates. Looking forward to sharing knowledge and experiences with you!
entry.summary: Hey there! Welcome to my tech blog. I’m Rafael, a DevOps Engineer passionate about cloud architecture and automation. Here, I’ll be sharing insights about AWS, DevOps practices, and emerging technologies.
